signin.longTitle: Say hello to your English tutors
signin.title: Log in
signin.description: Become fluent faster through one on one video chat lessons tailored to your goals.
signin.enterEmail: Please enter your email address to get the code.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.description: Become fluent faster through one on one video chat lessons tailored to your goals.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description1: Here is a list of the sessions you have booked
schedule.description2: You can track when the meeting starts, join the meeting with one click or can cancel the meeting before 2 hours
schedule.name: Name
schedule.request: Currently there are no requests for this class. Please write down any requests for the teacher.

history.title: History
history.description: The following is a list of lessons you have attended. You can review the details of the lessons you have attended
history.review: Currently, there are no review from tutor
history.reason: What was the reason you reported on the lesson?

becomeTutor.title: Set up your tutor profile
becomeTutor.description1: Your tutor profile is your chance to market yourself to students on Tutoring. You can make edits later on your profile settings page.
becomeTutor.description2: New students may browse tutor profiles to find a tutor that fits their learning goals and personality. Returning students may use the tutor profiles to find tutors they've had great experiences with already.
becomeTutor.noteForAvatar: Please upload a professional photo. See guidelines
becomeTutor.desForCV: Students will view this information on your profile to decide if you're a good fit for them.
becomeTutor.noteForCV: In order to protect your privacy, please do not share your personal information (email, phone number, social email, skype, etc) in your profile.
becomeTutor.noteForTeach: This is the first thing students will see when looking for tutors.
becomeTutor.whoStudents: I am best at teaching students who are
becomeTutor.desForIntroMySelf: Let students know what they can expect from a lesson with you by recording a video highlighting your teaching style, expertise and personality. Students can be nervous to speak with a foreigner, so it really helps to have a friendly video that introduces yourself and invites students to call you.
becomeTutor.trick1: 1. Find a clean and quiet space
becomeTutor.trick2: 2. Smile and look at the camera
becomeTutor.noteForVideo: Note: We only support uploading video file that is less than 64 MB in size.
becomeTutor.finishSubmission:
You have done all the steps 
Please, wait for the operator's approval
